page.title: 18Origins of Bromsgrove people
page.content: Children of the 2nd year were questioned about the places of birth of their parents and grandparents.then we worked out the distances that some have moved to end up in jolly Bromsgrove. 1.Bromsgrove(town or within 2 miles) 5.1%(grandparents)14.8%(parents) 2.Birmingham conurbation 44.8%(grandparents)38.2%(parents) 3.places closer than than 50 miles but outside the above 13.7%(grandparents) 4.2%(parents) 4.places more than 50 miles away 27.4% (grandparents) 34%(parents) 5.Wales 5.1%(grandparents) 4.2%(parents) 6.Abroad 3.4%(grandparents) 2.1%(parents) the origins of people in group 4 were evenly spread over the country,North and South.
